name: Little Dreams
description:
A small, minimal interaction 3D environment. Sleep in your bed to enter dream worlds, but you always wake up back in the same place.

Use W/A/S/D to move, mouse to look, and space to jump.
Click on the bed to go to lie down, and push the movement keys to get up again. Lie in bed and soon you'll begin to sleep.
Falling too quickly can cause you to wake up, but if you you want to wake up in a hurry, you can pinch yourself with the R key.

Originally created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 37, with the theme One Room.
